mapper.select: select b.ID_ from tb_judicial_case_info a left join ACT_RU_TASK b on a.process_instance_id=b.PROC_INST_ID_ where (a.case_code=#{case_code} or a.case_id=#{case_code}) and b.SUSPENSION_STATE_=1 limit 1
select b.ID_ from tb_invasive_prenatal a left join ACT_RU_TASK b on a.process_instance_id=b.PROC_INST_ID_ where (a.id=#{id} or a.num=#{num}) and b.SUSPENSION_STATE_=1 limit 1
select b.ID_ from tb_children_case_info a left join ACT_RU_TASK b on a.process_instance_id=b.PROC_INST_ID_ where (a.case_code=#{case_code} or a.case_id=#{case_code}) and b.SUSPENSION_STATE_=1 limit 1
SELECT a.`process_instance_id` FROM tb_judicial_case_info a WHERE (a.case_code = #{case_code} or a.case_id=#{case_code}) limit 1
SELECT a.`process_instance_id` FROM tb_invasive_prenatal a WHERE (a.id = #{id} or a.num=#{num}) limit 1
SELECT a.`process_instance_id` FROM tb_children_case_info a WHERE (a.case_code = #{case_code} or a.case_id=#{case_code}) limit 1
